constructor.details: mimics https://github.com/interep-project/contracts/blob/main/contracts/Interep.sol but ignores the verification mechanism

verifyProof(uint256,bytes32,uint256,uint.details: Saves the nullifier hash to avoid double signaling and emits an event if the zero-knowledge proof is valid.

NullifierHashAdded(uint256).notice: Emitted when a proof is verified correctly and a new nullifier hash is added.
